Text: Any comments on video and sound quality?

if this is supposed to be season 1, 2, and 3 it is crap imo...
you can't squeeze some 45 episodes into anything less than twice this torrents size....
that said, I have not watched any of these episodes (and more than likely neither has the person reading this, else they wouldn't be downloading all 3 seasons at once) so there may be less than 15 episodes per season....

okay, my last statement said....there are 10, 12, and 15 episodes in each season respectively and they are all 230mb...unless these episodes are less than 40 minutes long (though shouldn't they be a full hour if they are commerical free) it still isn't that good....

bah...I apologize for my incompetence...the episodes are only 30 minutes long so they are, in fact, good quality...

I am still downloading season 3 but I will upload 15 kb/s (not much, i know, but it is all I have to spare with all the other tv shows I am seeding) for then next 6 months or so....
Outstanding quality!!  Definitely worth the download.  And thanks a TON!
